version_description: Video preview, optimizations, game balance.
First public release. Enjoy! :)

* Brand new level number 9 - enjoy!
* Introducing weekly tournaments: dare to challenge your friends on a special level,
* 10 additional upgrades for health, magnet and missiles to pimp your ship,
* Fixed bug with achievements,
* Fixed problem with Facebook friends - please logout and login again,
* Lots of optimizations and bugfixes!

Thanks for playing Sky Force Reloaded - we'll keep on making new levels! :)

* New level available - enjoy Stage 10!
* New tournament stage for the weekend!
* Brand new plane with special weapon!
* Additional upgrades for Wing Cannons.
* Lots of optimizations and bugfixes.

Thanks for playing Sky Force Reloaded - we'll keep on making new levels! :)
If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please contact us at support@idreams.pl

- Enjoy an amazing level number 11,
- New upgrades for the Wing Cannons,
- Real-time shadows for bosses available on capable devices.
- Only 3 friends are required to play tournaments now,
- A lot of small improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!
If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please contact us at http://www.idreams.pl/pl/support

- Brand new level number 12 - enjoy!
- New upgrades for the Main Cannon,
- A lot of small improvements and bug fixes.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!
If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please contact us at support@idreams.pl

- introducing a support aircraft that brings relief in difficult moments,
- brand new aircraft to collect that features a very special weapon,
- collecting all cards unlocks a new kind of weapon,
- fixed problem with in-game timers,
- improved performance on older devices,
- fixed problem with 3d touch on iPad PRO,
- it's possible to make screenshots in slowmotion mode

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

If you encounter any issues or require further assistance, please contact us at support@idreams.pl

version_name: 1.51 contains a number of small bugfixes.If you have any problems with out game

version_description:
This is a maintenance update that will fix some of the problems introduced in the last update. Sorry about it!

We are aware of the fact that our game is still not perfect but we'd like you to know that we work very hard to fix all the remaining issues.

If you have any problems with out game, please make sure to contact us at support@idreams.pl and provide your feedback - this will help us to improve it.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

A new level 13 is coming soon - stay tuned! Meanwhile we have a bunch of cool stuff in this update. Check this out!

- introducing: technicians and prestige points,
- a surprise at the end of level 12
- new tournament level,
- additional info on cards,
- fixed problem with video ads on iOS 10.

If you have any problems with out game, please make sure to contact us at support@idreams.pl and provide your feedback - this will help us to improve it.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

A new level 13 is coming soon - stay tuned! Meanwhile we have a bunch of cool stuff in this update. Check this out!

- introducing: technicians and prestige points,
- a surprise at the end of level 12
- new tournament level,
- additional info on cards,
- fixed problem with video ads on iOS 10.

Version 1.51 contains a number of small bugfixes.

If you have any problems with out game, please make sure to contact us at support@idreams.pl and provide your feedback - this will help us to improve it.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

- finally, brand new stage 13 is here! Enjoy:)
- Nightmare difficulty mode for even more intense experience (unlocked after beating stage 13),
- new upgrades for main cannon, missiles and rockets,
- plenty of bugfixes and optimizations,
- introducing new friends system (beta version).

Important notice! In this update you can add your friends by entering the unique ID number. Facebook friends are temporarily disabled - please add them manually.

If you have any problems with our game, please make sure to contact us at support@idreams.pl and provide your feedback - this will help us to improve it.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

- Introducing: Card Radar - this tool will ease your card hunting,
- New cool set of avatars to personalize your flight!
- New tournament level,
- If you have a mutual friend on your list, you'll both start receiving gifts,
- Weekend Hero achievement progress is now fixed,
- Many more bugfixes and improvements!

If you have any problems with our game, please make sure to contact us at support@idreams.pl and provide your feedback - this will help us to improve it.

Thanks for your continuous support! We are working on new levels. Stay tuned!
If you like our game, please do not forget to rate it. Thanks!

IMPORTANT NOTICE: Some players are experiencing problems with this build - we are working on a solution. If your game does not launch, please try to re-install it. We do apologize for inconvenience.

- Special Christmas Level - enjoy :)
- Daily Christmas Gift!
- Facebook friends are back - you'll see them as a list of suggested friends,
- Suggested friends will also include people that have added you as a friend,
- Improved Card Radar visualisation,
- 9 new avatars.

Stay tuned, new level is coming soon!

If you like our game please do not forget to rate it every time the update is out. Thank you!
